story: Create config schema for repository targets, build settings, and notification preferences
verification: config.js loads with GitHub token, target repos, build commands

story: Build GitHub API client for repo monitoring (PRs, issues, commits, actions)
verification: src/github.js fetches PRs, issues, and workflow runs from target repos

story: Create dependency update scanner (npm outdated, security advisories)
verification: src/deps.js detects outdated packages and known vulnerabilities

story: Build automated PR creator for dependency updates
verification: src/pr-creator.js creates branch, updates package.json, opens PR

story: Create build status monitor for GitHub Actions workflows
verification: src/build-monitor.js tracks workflow runs, reports failures

story: Build changelog generator from commits and PRs
verification: src/changelog.js generates CHANGELOG.md from conventional commits

story: Create release automation (version bump, tag, GitHub release)
verification: src/release.js bumps version, creates tag, publishes release notes

story: Build notification system (Slack, Discord, email for build events)
verification: src/notify.js sends alerts for failed builds, merged PRs, releases

story: Create CLI interface with commands: status, update-deps, release, changelog
verification: npm run builder <command> executes appropriate action

story: Add daemon mode for continuous repo monitoring
verification: npm run daemon polls repos on schedule, auto-creates update PRs

story: Build code quality scanner integration (ESLint, TypeScript errors)
verification: src/quality.js runs linters and reports issues

story: Create deployment trigger for successful builds
verification: src/deploy.js triggers deployment on main branch merge
